saying: It's the early bird that catches the worm!
description: Twiggy is a peppy bird villager who appears in all games from the Animal Crossing series. Her name may be derived from birds using twigs to build their nests, though she may also be named after the model Twiggy, who was nicknamed 'Twiggy' because of her physique. Peppy villagers like Twiggy desire to be famous, so this may be related to her peppy personality.
